title: Joining a project plan should land the user to that planner after associating that to their account
Creating a project plan should land the user in that plan right away after adding it to their account
"Task blocks" should be referenced and not embedded in the "project plan" document (backend)
body: This is strictly a backend enhancement. This is what will allow the reactivity to takeover.

title: By striking off tasks in the task list, the task count should change in the task block
The timer on the planner runs incrementally without adhering to time formats
Allow editing task list of a task block
body: Editing includes both editing tasks and deleting individual tasks

title: Opening task list for a task block should allow for adding tasks
Secure login using oauth2 using facebook api
Modal for the account tab on clicking a person's name or clicking account in dropdown
Generation of 6 digit alphanumberic code that uniquely identifies a plan
body: This will be associated with each project plan

title: Upon clicking create planner, a new modal window should appear for creating a plan.
body: The modal windows should have a form that takes in start and end time for a hackathon and generates a 6 digit alphanumeric code(separate task)

title: On clicking on the join option in the user dropdown, a new modal window should appear
body: This modal window will only contain a small form which allows the user to enter the 6 digit alphanumeric code that uniquely identifies the planner.

title: Dropdown to be added for the user accounts.
body: This should be on the right hand side, wherein the user can create new planner,join existing ones, view account details and logout.

title: Introduce a dropdown for all the associated plans that user has joined
body: Every time user joins a planner its going to get populated in his planner dropdown

title: Get rid of the sidebar on the left side which includes navigation to participants,hackathons and planner
body: From here on out, there will be no participants or hackathons. There will only be the planner
